Parallel Computing, 21:731-751, 1995.<P> S. E. Hambrusch, X. He, and R. Miller. Mesh Algorithms for Gray-Scale Digitized Picture Component Labeling. Journal of Parallel and Distributed Computing, 20:56-68, 1994.<P> S. E. Hambrusch and A. Khokhar. C3: An Architecture-Independent Model for Coarse-Grained Parallel Machines. In Proceedings of the Sixth IEEE Symposium on Parallel and Distributed Processing, pages 544-551, October 1994.<P> L. H. Jamieson, S. E. Hambrusch, E. Delp, A. Khokhar, G. W. Cook, F. Hameed, J. Patel, and K. Shen. Parallel Scalable Libraries and Algorithms for Computer Vision. In Proceedings of the 12th International Conference on Pattern Recognition, pages 223-228, October 1994.<P> L. H. Jamieson, S. E. Hambrusch, A. Khokhar, and E. Delp. The Role of Models, Software Tools, and Applications in High Performance Computing. In Uzi Vishkin, editor, Developing Computer Science Agenda(s) for High-Performance Computing, pages 90-97.
